mapper.select: select count(review_no) from review where product_no = #{productNo}

select rownum ,customer_name as customerName ,grade ,review_no as reviewNo ,like_cnt as likeCnt ,title ,content ,REG_DATE as regDate from (select customer_name ,grade ,review_no ,like_cnt ,title ,content ,reg_date from review a join customer b on a.customer_no = b.customer_no where product_no = #{keyword} order by review_no desc) where rownum between #{boardNumStart} and #{ boardNumEnd}

select review_comment_no as commentNo ,c.customer_name as customerName ,a.content as content ,a.reg_date as regDate from review_comment a join review b on a.review_no = b.review_no join customer c on b.customer_no = c.customer_no where a.review_no = #{reviewNo} order by review_comment_no desc
